name: Camp Stalker Universal Crampons - Unisex
description: Great for mountaineering and glacier crossings that don't involve technical climbing, the Stalker Universal Crampon has an updated profile to fit modern mountaineering boots. With a universal binding, they're adaptable to almost any footwear, and fit flexible hiking boots or mountaineering boots without toe or heel welts.Made of durability chromoly steel.12 points design is great for general mountaineering.Binding has thermoplastic heel and toe harness, plus nylon straps.Dynamic anti-balling plates prevent snow and ice buildup.Flexible centre bar works with flexible footwear.Tool-free adjustment for easy sizing.Comes with carrying case for storage.
